p.strong: Seguin ISD has extended school closure based on executive order. Schools will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019 - 2020 school year.

div.p: Seguin ISD has extended school closure through May 1. Please click here for more information.

Seguin ISD Families: Please complete this survey to help the district assess family needs during the school closure. Complete one survey per family by Sunday, March 22, 2020 at 9 p.m. Thank you! https://bit.ly/395WDyW

Familiares Familias de Seguin ISD: Por favor complete esta encuesta para ayudar al distrito a evaluar la necesidad de apoyo para nuestras familias durante la clausura. Complete una encuesta por familia antes del domingo 22 de marzo a las 9 p.m. ¡Gracias! https://bit.ly/395WDyW
All Seguin ISD schools and offices will be closed the week of March 16 - April 3. Please click here for more information.
This includes cancellations of all district activities within those dates.
